tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE patients (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(255),
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(50),
  genetic_data JSONB
);

CREATE TABLE health_records (
  record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT REFERENCES patients(patient_id),
  visit_date DATE,
  diagnosis VARCHAR(255),
  medication VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE patient_data (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(50),
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  genetic_data JSONB
)

CREATE TABLE clinical_records (
  record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT REFERENCES patient_data(patient_id),
  diagnosis VARCHAR(100),
  treatment_plan TEXT,
  visit_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE genomic_data (
  sample_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT REFERENCES patient_data(patient_id),
  dna_sequence TEXT,
  mutation_type VARCHAR(50),
  genotype JSONB
)

CREATE TABLE GeneticData (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    gene_name VARCHAR(50),
    dna_sequence TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE ClinicalRecords (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    record_type VARCHAR(50),
    record_data TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE PatientInfo (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR(50),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10)
)

CREATE TABLE PrecisionMedicine (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    treatment_plan TEXT,
    outcome TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE patients (
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR(100),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    diagnosis VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE genetic_data (
    data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    gene_name VARCHAR(50),
    gene_sequence TEXT,
    CONSTRAINT fk_patient FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patients(patient_id)
);

CREATE TABLE clinical_records (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    visit_date DATE,
    doctor_name VARCHAR(100),
    condition VARCHAR(255),
    CONSTRAINT fk_patient_records FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patients(patient_id)
);

CREATE TABLE treatments (
    treatment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    record_id INT,
    treatment_name VARCHAR(100),
    dosage VARCHAR(50),
    CONSTRAINT fk_record_treatment FOREIGN KEY (record_id) REFERENCES clinical_records(record_id)
);

CREATE TABLE lab_results (
    result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    record_id INT,
    test_name VARCHAR(100),
    result_value FLOAT,
    units VARCHAR(20),
    CONSTRAINT fk_record_result FOREIGN KEY (record_id) REFERENCES clinical_records(record_id)
);
